Aquinas, Collingwood, and Oakeshott on Art

Bibliography

  • Collingwood, R. G. 2010. The Principles of Art. Oxford: Oxford Univ. Press.
  • Eco, Umberto, and Hugh Bredin. 1988. The Aesthetics of Thomas Aquinas. London: Radius.
  • Oakeshott, Michael. 1991. Rationalism in Politics and Other Essays. Indianapolis: Liberty Fund.
